HotelElement.Name: Crystal Inn Hotel & Suites West Valley City

Description.Text: Location The hotel in West Valley City, Utah's second largest city, is a beautiful, modern hotel less than 10 minutes from the Salt Lake International Airport. The Maverik Center (91 m), the Utah Cultural Celebration Center (2.4 km), USANA Amphitheatre (10 km), and Hale Center Theater (82 m) make this part of the valley a true entertainment hub. The Great Salt Lake State Marina (32 km) offers beautiful views of the lake, Antelope Island State Park and Black Rock. Facilities The hotel was built in 1997. Travellers are welcomed at the establishment, which has a total of 122 rooms. The individual storeys can easily be reached via the lift or stairs. Services and facilities at the hotel include a safe, a breakfast room, a laundry service, a conference room, a business centre and a coin-operated laundry. Wireless internet access in public areas allows guests to stay connected. Shopping facilities are also available. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the accommodation. Travellers can also use the bicycle storage facilities. In addition, a shuttle service is offered. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. Additional features include a fridge, a mini fridge, a microwave and a tea/coffee station. An ironing set is also available for guests' convenience. Little extras, including internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio and WiFi, contribute to a great stay. The bathrooms are fitted with a shower, a bathtub and a hot tub. A hairdryer can also be found in each of the bathrooms. The hotel offers non-smoking rooms and smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment The establishment features a pool and an indoor pool. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. A range of options are available, including a gym and hydrotherapy applications. An entertainment programme is offered for children. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable. Options include breakfast. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the accommodation: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.
